description:
**Fix Overview**:

To address the remote code execution vulnerability in the Microsoft WDAC OLE DB provider for SQL Server as described in CVE-2024-21361:

1. Download and install the appropriate updates for your version of Windows from the links provided below.
2. For confirmation, check that your system has the latest updates installed and is running a secure version of the software.

**Details**:
- This update mitigates the risk of remote code execution by addressing the underlying vulnerability in the reported OLE DB provider.
- Ensure to identify your Windows version before downloading the updates for smooth installation.

**Preconditions**:
- Make sure your device is running one of the impacted Windows versions listed in the metadata.
- Backup critical data before proceeding with the update installation.

**Available Update Package Links**:
- For Windows 11 Version 23H2: [KB5034765](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5034765)
- For Windows 10 Version 22H2: [KB5034763](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5034763) (special focus recommended for this build)
- Additional updates for earlier versions can also be found at the catalog links provided above.
